description: Try our easy to follow Masala Fish With Mango & Turmeric Rice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Masala Fish With Mango & Turmeric Rice
name: Masala Fish With Mango & Turmeric Rice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 75 g salad crunchy powergreens kale leaf & spinach

recipeInstructions.text: Place fish on rice, top with yoghurt sauce and green part of spring onion, scatter over extra mint leaves and serve with lime cheeks.
